column5: ~~~okay guys I thought this would be a great idea for you guys with cottages, who can't get up to it on the weekends, I'm willing to go to your cottage, and sit on your porch, and relax inside, and even phish off your dock. will bring my own food, and beer. And if it's a great place I will give you a discount on the cost. The only situation is the cottage most have Wi-Fi. Send PM with directions, and location of the key
joke or serious? hard to tell. Airbnb if your serious.
I feel like someone may have approached him with this same offer and he is now posting it satirically?
LOL You actually want to be paid to sit, drink beer and fish,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  :rofl2:

LOL You actually want to be paid to sit, drink beer and fish,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  :rofl2: Heck, If I could find a way to do it I would also! Funny thing is, when I was much younger ( late teens early twenty's ) I pretty much had that set up. Friend of the family had a cottage that they only used 2 or 3 weeks of the summer. I would stay there the rest of the time watching the place and keeping the grass cut ect... it was a pretty sweet deal.
There could be a future in this if you make the offer to the right audience?
Exactly what are you smokin? ?
I like the way you think!
~~~I'm just a guy with free time on the weekend will to help out, and baby sit your cottages PS I don't cut grass, or wash windows
Wanna do this in the winter with no WIFI? I'll pay you in letting you know where the hot spots are.
This is valid.  My parents went away for 6 weeks recently and they paid me my gas to run there and back a few times a week to check on the place and get the mail (was a cottage now F-T home).

Good on you oldphart.  I commend your work ethic.  Too many people just want to take the easy way through life, and you're still willing to put your nose to the grindstone and do the jobs others won't.  You're are a good example for the youth of today.

Good on you oldphart.  I commend your work ethic.  Too many people just want to take the easy way through life, and you're still willing to put your nose to the grindstone and do the jobs others won't.  You're are a good example for the youth of today.  lollll   can i start a bidding war here? I will match old pharts offer but will mow grass...will not wash windows though
LOL You actually want to be paid to sit, drink beer and fish,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  :rofl2:  Sure, turn it into a political thread
oldphart by any chance are you new to this country from the middle east somewhere! With a Canada goose jacket and iPhone (assumed by the wifi comment)?  JK
Sure, turn it into a political thread

~~~Why Firebird yes I am a nude Canadian arrived here just 70 years ago, in the nude, and figured why change I don't wear Canada Goose jackets too hard to get them off the gooses, rather embrace the crisp clean Canadian air

You had me hiring you for a small amount paid to you for expenses on the odd weekends we would not be there..........however, no WiFi or cell service available...... but you do have a great idea.........
I'll mow the lawn and fix whatever needs fixing. Owner pays materials and the labour is free.  Maybe I can be a standby in case oldphart gets too busy ?
I have no such WiFi or cell requiRemer but do require a dock I can tie my boat up t.... monitor
